title: Locate & Define Needs
text: Identify purpose, audience, and scope of the event by gathering inputs from students, clubs, and faculty.

title: Research & Data
text: Review possible venues, confirm dates, set budgets, and shortlist speakers, judges, and volunteers.

title: Program Design
text: Draft the agenda, plan registrations, prepare rubrics and safety lists, and align tasks with organizers.

title: Finalize & Communicate
text: Confirm logistics, coordinate with advisors, launch publicity, and finalize sponsorships if required.

title: Report & Showcase
text: Publish results and photos, highlight achievements, share learnings, and plan improvements for future.
